channel.title: 计算过程 on Fatkun's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in 计算过程 on Fatkun's Blog

item.title: Hive – JOIN实现过程
item.description: 准备数据 语句 SELECT a.uid,a.name,b.age FROM logs a JOIN users b ON (a.uid=b.uid); 我们希望的结果是把users表join进来获取age字段。 hive> select * from logs; OK a 苹果 5 a 橙子 3 b 烧鸡 1 hive> select * from users; OK a

item.title: Hive – Group By 的实现
item.description: 准备数据 SELECT uid, sum(count) FROM logs group by uid; hive> select * from logs; a 苹果 5 a 橙子 3 a 苹果 2 b 烧鸡 1 hive> SELECT uid, sum(count) FROM logs group by uid; a 10 b 1 计算过程 默认设置了hive.map.aggr=t
